h1. Null Project Security

This element turns off security at the project level. A project with this security will give all rights to all users.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.5

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<security type="nullProjectSecurity" />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

|| Element || Description || Type || Required || Default || Version ||
| type | The type of the project security. | String - must be nullProjectSecurity | Yes | _n/a_ | 1.5 |
